description.narrative: Education stakeholders at national and sub-national level have increased capacity to implement at scale sustainable programmes to improve equitable access for the most disadvantaged children, especially girls.

sector.narrative: Education analyses including OOSCI, Education Sector Analyses, etc.
Provision of (formal and non-formal) primary education (including in temporary learning spaces)
System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary standards and governance

title.narrative: UNICEF Programmes in Afghanistan (Adolescent Health and Development)
Afghanistan Country Programme Document 2015-2019 Results Matrix
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2019 Afghanistan: Mid-term evaluation of the increasing access to basic education and gender equality programme
Afghanistan 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
Afghanistan Country Office 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Education stakeholders at national and sub-national level have increased capacity to implement at scale sustainable programmes to improve equitable access for the most disadvantaged children, especially girls.

description.narrative: UNICEF supported interventions sustained access to education for 35,022 students (18,949 female 16,073 male) in Community based Schools (CBS), Accelerated Learning Centres, Early Child Development (ECD) classes and formal schools. Work initiated on the Community Based Education (CBE) policy is expected to be finalized by the end of the year. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:27/07/2020

title.narrative: System Strengthening - Early learning - Early learning policy and early learning programme including quality early learning curriculum and standards - score (1-4), see guidance
Service Delivery - Primary school aged Out of school children in the reporting year accessing formal or non-formal education with support of UNICEF, see guidance
Existence of strategies to strengthen identification and reduction of OOSC, prevention of drop-out, re-entry of children in formal and non-formal education

target.value: 2021:National OOSC strategy developed and operational plan implemented

actual.value: 2020:The OOSC policy drafted but not finalized
